Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Actions.Name: Judgement
Actions.Description: Mark a character in range 8. At the end of that character's turn, if they are still marked, they take [D] piercing damage for every 3 spaces of distance between them and the justicar. Then, clear the mark.
